meanings.definition: Covered with a hard outer layer
meanings.sent1: The crusted pie crust was golden and delicious.
meanings.sent2: The old barn had a crusted layer of paint peeling off.
meanings.sent3: The crusted mud on his shoes made him look like a messy explorer.
meanings.sent4: Her crusted heart thawed when she saw the puppy's sad eyes.
meanings.sent5: The crusted cheese on top of the lasagna was bubbling and irresistible.

meanings.definition: Formed into a hard outer layer
meanings.sent1: The crusted bread had a crunchy texture when bitten into.
meanings.sent2: The crusted snow on the ground sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The crusted ice on the windshield made it impossible to see.
meanings.sent4: His crusted determination never wavered, no matter the obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The crusted lava flow created a new landscape on the island.

meanings.definition: Having a hard outer layer formed by drying or cooling
meanings.sent1: The crusted mud on his boots cracked as he walked.
meanings.sent2: The crusted chocolate on the cake added a rich flavor.
meanings.sent3: The crusted glue on the paper made it difficult to separate the pages.
meanings.sent4: Her crusted resolve to finish the race kept her going despite the pain.
meanings.sent5: The crusted paint on the walls gave the room a rustic charm.
